panels.title: Partitions Leader and Replica Per Broker

targets.legendFormat: Total messages from ${__from:date:MM-DD hA} to ${__to:date:MM-DD hA}

targets.expr: rate(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_messagesinpersec{instance=~"$broker", job="$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", topic!="", topic=~"$topic"}[5m])

rate(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_totalproducerequestspersec{instance=~"$broker", job="$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", topic!=""}[5m])

panels.title: Total Produce Request Rate Per Topic

targets.expr: rate(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestspersec{instance=~"$broker", job="$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", request=~"Produce"}[5m])

rate(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_failedproducerequestspersec{instance=~"$broker", job=~"$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", topic!="", topic=~"$topic"}[5m])

panels.title: Isr Shrinks / Isr Expands Per Sec

targets.expr: rate(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestspersec{instance=~"$broker", job="$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", request=~"FetchFollower"}[5m])

rate(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestspersec{instance=~"$broker", job="$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", request="Fetch"}[5m])

panels.title: Number of Requests Waiting in the Fetch Purgatory

targets.expr: rate(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_totalfetchrequestspersec{instance=~"$broker", job="$job", juju_application="$juju_application", juju_model="$juju_model", juju_model_uuid="$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit="$juju_unit", topic!=""}[5m])

panels.title: Number of Requests Waiting in the Producer Purgatory
